title: “After Stress Ripped My Immune System to Shreds, I Cured Myself” | Robert Zembroski on Health Theory
description: This week’s guest on Health Theory is Dr. Robert Zembroski.  He is a physician, nutritionist and cancer survivor. From his experiences rebuilding himself after a cancer diagnosis, he wrote the book, Rebuild: Five Proven Steps To Move From Diagnosis to Recovery And Be Healthier Than Before.  In this episode he talks about why most diseases are self inflicted and how to start looking for answers outside the traditional medical system.   BUY Rebuild by Dr. Robert Zembroski: https://amzn.to/2U7hfzw     Check out our amazing sponsors!
